# isVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that Indicates whether the Touch Bar is eligible for display.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

A value of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] indicates that the bar is attached to an eligible bar provider and that its items are displayable, assuming adequate geometric space. A *bar provider* is an object that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBarProvider] protocol. For more on bar providers, read [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar#Bar-objects].

This property is key–value observable.

## Observing bar status

- **itemIdentifiers**: The list of identifiers for the current items in the Touch Bar.
- **item(forIdentifier:)**: Returns the Touch Bar item that corresponds to a given identifier.

items.description: The list of identifiers for the current items in the Touch Bar.
items.name: itemIdentifiers

items.description: Returns the Touch Bar item that corresponds to a given identifier.
items.name: item(forIdentifier:)
